titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to restrict the requirement of citizenship at birth by virtue of birth in the United States to persons with a legal resident mother or father.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.
Joint Hearings Held by the Subcommittee on the Constitution and by the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 1/19/1995--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Limits citizenship at birth to persons born in the United States to a mother or father who is a U.S. legal resident.
